sell-birthright.context: Jacob demands the birthright for soup

i-am-esau.context: Jacob deceives Isaac for the blessing

wrestled-angel.hebrew: וַיֵּאָבֵק אִישׁ עִמּוֹ עַד עֲלוֹת הַשָּׁחַר
wrestled-angel.english: A man wrestled with him until dawn

will-not-release.english: I will not let you go unless you bless me

named-israel.context: Jacob receives new name after wrestling
named-israel.hebrew: כִּי שָׂרִיתָ עִם אֱלֹהִים וְעִם אֲנָשִׁים וַתּוּכָל
named-israel.english: You have striven with God and with humans, and have prevailed

quiet-tent-dweller.english: A quiet man, dwelling in tents

rivalry-genesis-25-23.context: God's revelation to Rebekah about the twins in her womb
rivalry-genesis-25-23.hebrew: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ יְהוָ֨ה לָ֜הּ שְׁנֵי־גֹויִם֙ בְּבִטְנֵ֔ךְ וּשְׁנֵ֣י לְאֻמִּים֘ מִמֵּעַיִךְ֙ יִפָּרֵ֔דוּ וּלְאֹם֙ מִלְאֹם֙ יֶאֱמָ֔ץ וְרַ֥ב יַעֲבֹ֖ד צָעִֽיר׃
rivalry-genesis-25-23.english: And the Lord said unto her, Two nations are in thy womb, and two manner of people shall be separated from thy bowels; and the one people shall be stronger than the other people; and the elder shall serve the younger.

rivalry-genesis-25-33.context: Esau sells his birthright to Jacob.
rivalry-genesis-25-33.hebrew: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר יַעֲקֹב֙ הִשָּׁ֣בְעָה לִּ֔י כַּיֹּ֖ום וַיִּשָּׁ֣בַע לֹ֑ו וַיִּמְכֹּ֛ר אֶת־בְּכֹרָתֹ֖ו לְיַעֲקֹֽב׃
rivalry-genesis-25-33.english: And Jacob said, Swear to me this day; and he sware unto him: and he sold his birthright unto Jacob.

rivalry-genesis-27-36.context: Esau laments the loss of his birthright and blessing.
rivalry-genesis-27-36.hebrew: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ הֲכִי֩ קָרָ֨א שְׁמֹ֤ו יַעֲקֹב֙ וַיַּעְקְבֵ֙נִי֙ זֶ֣ה פַעֲמַ֔יִם אֶת־בְּכֹרָתִי֙ לָקָ֔ח וְהִנֵּ֥ה עַתָּ֖ה לָקַ֣ח אֶת־בִּרְכָתִ֑י וַיֹּאמַ֕ר הֲלֹא־אָצַ֥לְתָּ לִּ֖י בְּרָכָֽה׃
rivalry-genesis-27-36.english: And he said, Is not he rightly named Jacob? for he hath supplanted me these two times: he took away my birthright; and, behold, now he hath taken away my blessing. And he said, Hast thou not reserved a blessing for me?

rivalry-genesis-27-41.context: Esau plots to kill Jacob after Isaac dies.
rivalry-genesis-27-41.hebrew: וַיִּשְׂטֹ֨ם עֵשָׂ֜ו אֶת־יַעֲקֹ֗ב עַל־הַבְּרָכָה֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר בֵּרֲכֹו אָבִ֔יו וַיֹּ֤אמֶר עֵשָׂו֙ בְּלִבֹּ֔ו יִקְרְב֣וּ יְמֵי־אֵבֵל֮ אָבִי֒ וְאַֽהַרְגָה֙ אֶת־יַעֲקֹ֣ב אָחִֽי׃
rivalry-genesis-27-41.english: And Esau hated Jacob because of the blessing wherewith his father blessed him: and Esau said in his heart, The days of mourning for my father are at hand; then will I slay my brother Jacob.

rivalry-genesis-33-4.hebrew: וַיָּ֤רָץ עֵשָׂו֙ לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ וַֽיְחַבְּקֵ֔הוּ וַיִּפֹּ֥ל עַל־צַוָּארָ֖ו וַׄיִּשָּׁקֵ֑הוּ וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃
rivalry-genesis-33-4.english: And Esau ran to meet him, and embraced him, and fell on his neck, and kissed him: and they wept.
